characters.character_1: Liam, a young adventurous traveler in his late 20s with short brown hair, green eyes, and light stubble. He wears a casual blue button-up shirt with rolled-up sleeves, beige cargo pants, and brown leather shoes. He carries a small backpack over one shoulder.
characters.character_2: Waiter, a middle-aged Spanish man with short black hair and a neatly trimmed beard. He wears a traditional white shirt, black vest, and black pants with a small notepad in his hand.

places.place_1: A charming small café in Madrid with wooden tables and chairs, a warm and cozy atmosphere, and the aroma of fresh coffee and pastries filling the air. A large chalkboard menu hangs on the wall behind the counter, listing various coffee and pastry options. The walls are decorated with Spanish tiles and framed pictures.
places.place_2: A lively street outside the café with cobblestone pavement, colorful Spanish buildings with balconies, and pedestrians walking by. There is a warm evening glow from street lamps.

negative_common_prompt: No modern technology, no anachronisms, no exaggerated cartoonish features, no futuristic elements.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} is arriving at {place_1}, looking around with curiosity. The café entrance is inviting, with a warm glow from inside and a wooden sign hanging above the door.
prompts.negative_prompt: No other customers inside, no futuristic or modern elements.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} stands at the entrance of {place_1}, taking in the rich aroma of coffee and pastries. He smiles as he breathes in the scent.
prompts.negative_prompt: No other distractions, no bright neon lights.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} walks inside {place_1}, looking around at the wooden tables, framed pictures on the walls, and the large chalkboard menu.
prompts.negative_prompt: No futuristic elements, no crowded scenes.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} stands at the counter of {place_1}, reading the chalkboard menu with a thoughtful expression.
prompts.negative_prompt: No digital screens, no baristas wearing headphones.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} in {place_1} sees ‘coffee with milk and churros’ on the menu and looks slightly puzzled, thinking about the word ‘churros.’
prompts.negative_prompt: No exaggerated facial expressions, no unnecessary background characters.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} confidently orders ‘one coffee with milk and lots of churros’ while smiling in {place_1}.
prompts.negative_prompt: No incorrect uniforms on the waiter, no overly large or futuristic elements.

prompts.prompt: {character_2} raises an eyebrow slightly but nods while writing down the order in {place_1}.
prompts.negative_prompt: No exaggerated expressions, no digital screens.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} sits at a wooden table inside {place_1}, waiting for his order, looking around at the cozy decorations.
prompts.negative_prompt: No other customers crowding the scene.

prompts.prompt: in {place_1}, {character_2} approaching with a tray carrying a cup of coffee and a large plate stacked with churros.
prompts.negative_prompt: No incorrect waiter uniform, no other customers in focus.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} sits in {place_1} looks shocked and wide-eyed as he sees the enormous plate of churros placed before him.
prompts.negative_prompt: No cartoonish exaggerations, no unrealistic food proportions.

prompts.prompt: {character_2} laughs and gestures toward the churros in {place_1}
prompts.negative_prompt: No modern distractions, no background crowd noise.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} sits in {place_1} picks up a churro, dips it in chocolate, and takes a bite, his face lighting up with delight.
prompts.negative_prompt: No unrealistic expressions, no unnecessary background elements.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} leans back in his chair, grinning and savoring the churros in {place_1}, realizing this was the best mistake ever.
prompts.negative_prompt: No futuristic elements, no distractions in the scene.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} leaves {place_1}, stepping onto {place_2}, looking happy and satisfied.
prompts.negative_prompt: No crowded streets, no modern advertisements.

prompts.prompt: {character_1} walks down {place_2}, thinking about his funny ordering mistake and smiling.
prompts.negative_prompt: No mobile phones, no futuristic elements.
